tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor started with a friendly note as if he knew us. Half the problem was gone. He listened calmly,  got our diagnosis reports early and was ready. He even called us for video and the discussions were simple. The relaxed sweet tone of him soothened our hypertension. His prescriptions looks satisfactory to us. We strongly reccomend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Good. He diagnoised and suggested treatment required for my health condition and referred a general surgeon for further treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've been visited many doctors in the past but haven't seen anyone looking at issue such in detail and hearing out patiently and clearly articulated in prescription.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr is very friendly and he explains well. He suggested how to maintain diet during treatment.
Thank u

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor clarified my questions with patience. Clearly explained about the issues in my medical check up report.
